code:
graph TB
    subgraph "monbus_axil_group"
        subgraph "Monitor Bus Input"
            MON_IN[Groupware_SprintBacklog] --> PARSE[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
        end

        subgraph "Per-Protocol Filtering"
            PARSE --> FILTER[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
            AXI_MASK[Groupware_ChatRoom] --> FILTER
            AXIS_MASK[Groupware_WikiPage] --> FILTER
            CORE_MASK[Groupware_IssueTracker] --> FILTER
        end

        subgraph "Routing Decision"
            FILTER --> DROP{Groupware_IssueTracker}
            DROP --> |No| ERR_CHK{Groupware_KanbanBoard}
            DROP --> |Yes| DISCARD[Groupware_WikiPage]
            ERR_CHK --> |Yes| ERR_PATH[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
            ERR_CHK --> |No| WR_PATH[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
        end

        subgraph "Error/Interrupt Path"
            ERR_PATH --> ERR_FIFO[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
            ERR_FIFO --> AXIL_S[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
            ERR_FIFO --> IRQ[Groupware_ChatRoom]
        end

        subgraph "Master Write Path"
            WR_PATH --> WR_FIFO[Groupware_SprintBacklog]
            WR_FIFO --> ADDR_GEN[Groupware_IssueTracker]
            CFG_BASE[Groupware_KanbanBoard] --> ADDR_GEN
            ADDR_GEN --> AXIL_M[Groupware_WikiPage]
        end
    end

    AXIL_S --> S_AR[Groupware_WikiPage]
    AXIL_S --> S_R[Groupware_WikiPage]
    AXIL_M --> M_AW[Groupware_WikiPage]
    AXIL_M --> M_W[Groupware_KanbanBoard]
    AXIL_M --> M_B[Groupware_SprintBacklog]

    style FILTER fill:#bbf,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style ERR_FIFO fill:#fbb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
    style WR_FIFO fill:#bfb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
    style ADDR_GEN fill:#ffb,stroke:#333,stroke-width:2px
    style IRQ fill:#f9f,stroke:#333,stroke-width:3px
repo_description: This site is hopefully a springboard for others to learn about coding in System Verilog and experimenting with FPGAs.
